title: Magnificent Desolation
description: The United States confronts race riots and the Vietnam War. Science fiction wrestles with its purpose now that space travel has become real. And NASA investigates its own failings. In the 11th chapter of “Moonrise,” we look inward.
dc:creator: The Washington Post
itunes:author: The Washington Post
